title: How to Change the Theme in Windows 10

steps.title: Right-click the desktop and select Personalize.
steps.content: Right-click the desktop and select Personalize . Make sure you're right-clicking an empty area of the desktopâ€”clicking an icon will not produce the "Personalization" menu.

steps.title: Click the Themes tab.
steps.content: Click the Themes tab. You'll see it on the left sidebar. Now you can view some sample themes or click Get more themes in Microsoft Store to see what else is out there.

steps.title: Click a theme to select it.
steps.content: Click a theme to select it. This instantly changes your desktop theme to the new color and layout.
